title: Population of Virginia , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: This chart shows the Number of residents conducted by in a race ethnicity .
\\n From the chart we see that the Hispanic_or_Latino_(of_any_race) Race was the Population Virginia Race in the ethnicity with 5224295 residents .
The next Race to make the most residents was the Asian_alone Race with 550696 residents closely followed by Native_Hawaiian_and_Other_Pacific_Islander_alone with 4587 residents .

data.Race: American Indian and Alaska Native alone
Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone

gold: This statistic shows the population of Virginia , distinguished by race and Hispanic origin in 2018 . In 2018 , about 1.6 million people in Virginia were Black or African American .
